      • sendAppointmentAndUser

        public void sendAppointmentAndUser​(Appointment appt,
                                   User currentUser)
        Receives the appointment that will be updated and the currently logged in user. Used to prepopulate TextFields, ComboBoxes, and DatePickers.
        Parameters:
        appt - The appointment selected by the user to be updated.
        currentUser - The user that is currently logged in.
